tech_residency.description: Developed a PL/SQL package with procedures and functions necessary to handle employees data. Mentored by FCx Labs' Senior DBA Analyst. Also concluded a course in back-end development with NodeJS sponsored by Rocketseat programming school.
Created a no-code project in Bubble.io for completion of the course. Also concluded courses in front-end development with HTML, CSS and JavaScript sponsored by Alura Include programming school.

extracurriculum.institution: Catholic University of Pernambuco (UNICAP), Recife, Brazil
extracurriculum.activity: Undergraduate Research in Assistive Technologies for e-health

education.institution: School of Technology and Communication of the Catholic University of Pernambuco (ETC/UNICAP), Recife, Brazil
